c100754fb8d3b28b782a26cbcf94c540f7ad713d Update rules_java to 8.11.0 and java_tools to 13.18 (#280)

**MODULE.bazel setup**
~~~
bazel_dep(name = "rules_java", version = "8.11.0")
~~~

**WORKSPACE setup**
~~~
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_java",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/releases/download/8.11.0/rules_java-8.11.0.tar.gz",
    ],
    sha256 = "d31b6c69e479ffa45460b64dc9c7792a431cac721ef8d5219fc9f603fa2ff877",
)

load("@rules_java//java:rules_java_deps.bzl", "rules_java_dependencies")
rules_java_dependencies()

# note that the following line is what is minimally required from protobuf for the java rules
# consider using the protobuf_deps() public API from @com_google_protobuf//:protobuf_deps.bzl
load("@com_google_protobuf//bazel/private:proto_bazel_features.bzl", "proto_bazel_features")  # buildifier: disable=bzl-visibility
proto_bazel_features(name = "proto_bazel_features")

# register toolchains
load("@rules_java//java:repositories.bzl", "rules_java_toolchains")
rules_java_toolchains()
~~~

**Using the rules**
See [the source](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/tree/8.11.0).

**Changes since 8.9.0**
8b3a998cc3e043a2048681e5259766a8ab71f52a Release `@rules_java` `v8.10.0`
784f519719ecfce201624fad8e39cb13f67b70cb Update `java_tools` `v13.17`
3d757492427c10c73e48cbd0aa0623f12bfb769a Internal change
e8296038885518d7eceedffec552150bb9b0fa45 Add a separate config for Bazel 8 to rules_java CI
fca8eb92832025ad3b840244c31037701d7b3893 Add a test that `java_binary(stamp = -1)` does not override default stamping
fe2e139b2ca521b070a01160197cb506f57ba612 Add a test for java_common.compile() with a custom bootclasspathinfo and empty bootclasspath
8b950284b900af7aab13697ad3275cead6c6486f Add a test for java_common.compile() with a custom bootclasspath
2ffef4ad52fe82efc5ffba64388595b03e73afcc Add another test for extending compile time jdeps
3bed9dc56ba246dd7936a24b37d0e167d5e8c6a5 Add a test for extending compile time jdeps
5d4442ee1c0adc3db015f218cc9fa9e973d91c0f Add a test for `java_common.JavaPluginInfo`
31566a6f426215dbd86fc60fdab5486dedbdc4ef Internal change
f5748b3893c3930d76647689d3050a6694a5656e Add a test for `java_common.compile()`
832cf12302488fb946c223f31668109fdc286e0d Internal change
eb4d15ae6ffec1a88bb60c005f6c2323d97849cd Add a test for `java_common.compile` with exports and no sources
250bbdc8e9287d2cdffbeadd2c3485c4b9817ea2 Switch rules_java back to more named params (quasi-rollback of unknown commit)
31edc44e0901b06ddb0f9c96984c69ea77bc8326 Add make variables for runfiles location of $(JAVABASE) to support --no_legacy_external_runfiles. (#272)
02ab5e6c9bc0310510761b21f951112d81a4eef0 Delete toolchains/BUILD.java_tools.
ea19ca450c4f32c813575a2b6041551ebc875dc4 Add a test for `java_common.compile(sourcepath = ...)`
609086687610bb3c13aa76c2bce33a8f85c6e9ff Extract legacy native symbols to a separate bzl file
290ffee0dda03531eadaa7f6c0e0c652388c3c57 Migrate `javaLibrary_propagatesDirectCcLinkingInformation` to Starlark
b57046afd14f9df9c016e6e937351c52fedc5551 Migrate the `javaInfo_exposesCcLinkingInformation` test to Starlark
af504cff01d441676f2d3e3b64c92d010f85d835 Rename `extra_processor_classes` to `processor_classes` for processor bundle support
6f2db13f96fe160a4ec5da0fe2c230bb05e8e38a Enforce `checkLegalityOfPluginOptions` check on `-AgeneratesKotlin` javacopts.

**MODULE.bazel setup**
~~~
bazel_dep(name = "rules_java", version = "8.10.0")
~~~

**WORKSPACE setup**
~~~
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_java",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/releases/download/8.10.0/rules_java-8.10.0.tar.gz",
    ],
    sha256 = "476bd403f284e5080037f1910a29ce4c482ac798a3560c2e0df6d6f1857011b6",
)

load("@rules_java//java:rules_java_deps.bzl", "rules_java_dependencies")
rules_java_dependencies()

# note that the following line is what is minimally required from protobuf for the java rules
# consider using the protobuf_deps() public API from @com_google_protobuf//:protobuf_deps.bzl
load("@com_google_protobuf//bazel/private:proto_bazel_features.bzl", "proto_bazel_features")  # buildifier: disable=bzl-visibility
proto_bazel_features(name = "proto_bazel_features")

# register toolchains
load("@rules_java//java:repositories.bzl", "rules_java_toolchains")
rules_java_toolchains()
~~~

**Using the rules**
See [the source](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/tree/8.10.0).

93fdd8af3a1087866425a9f162892cc521642698 Add a test asseting that the JavaInfo returned by java_binary targets are marked as such.
4aa66735ea294529cb9c5a64b8402365d0f07068 Improve `android_support_tests.bzl`

**WORKSPACE setup**
~~~
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_java",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/releases/download/8.6.1/rules_java-8.6.1.tar.gz",
    ],
    sha256 = "c5bc17e17bb62290b1fd8fdd847a2396d3459f337a7e07da7769b869b488ec26",
)

load("@rules_java//java:rules_java_deps.bzl", "rules_java_dependencies")
rules_java_dependencies()

# note that the following line is what is minimally required from protobuf for the java rules
# consider using the protobuf_deps() public API from @com_google_protobuf//:protobuf_deps.bzl
load("@com_google_protobuf//bazel/private:proto_bazel_features.bzl", "proto_bazel_features")  # buildifier: disable=bzl-visibility
proto_bazel_features(name = "proto_bazel_features")

# register toolchains
load("@rules_java//java:repositories.bzl", "rules_java_toolchains")
rules_java_toolchains()
~~~

**Using the rules**
See [the source](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/tree/8.6.1).

**Changes since 8.5.1**
36a3669567bcc488938ac87055fdca95b6813a7f Release `@rules_java` `v8.6.0`
4206c536c77c4f1ec9a918987d31a3c528e5c0b4 Revert `bootstrap_runtime_toolchain_type` changes
a04ab3cdf4ea1d114946faf24529c5d0bb03b46a Remove `java_binary.classlist`
c22454fadb4773cbd202bfa3e28f1d6a88c4c94a Build bootclasspath in a UTF-8 environment
6b37b158868eaf07f0d2b0e0219f8ae87f5aca39 Rename `rules_java` runfiles package `BUILD.bazel` -> `BUILD`
c81497b5f8a56141edfe499d9bc63391c93f3492 Add back `bzl_library` deps to `@rules_java//java/common` for maintaining backwards compatibility

**MODULE.bazel setup**
~~~
bazel_dep(name = "rules_java", version = "8.6.0")
~~~

~~~

    name = "rules_java",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/releases/download/8.6.0/rules_java-8.6.0.tar.gz",
    ],
    sha256 = "8475fae7a95463a4fd323a46b0f5601f89863ba019afa358cc9fa1d0e67cdd63",
)

load("@rules_java//java:rules_java_deps.bzl", "rules_java_dependencies")
rules_java_dependencies()

# note that the following line is what is minimally required from protobuf for the java rules
# consider using the protobuf_deps() public API from @com_google_protobuf//:protobuf_deps.bzl
load("@com_google_protobuf//bazel/private:proto_bazel_features.bzl", "proto_bazel_features")  # buildifier: disable=bzl-visibility
proto_bazel_features(name = "proto_bazel_features")

# register toolchains
load("@rules_java//java:repositories.bzl", "rules_java_toolchains")
rules_java_toolchains()
~~~

**Using the rules**
See [the source](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/tree/8.6.0).

**Changes since 8.4.0**
349608c3b0fd0bf3856cd0b6acc9e5fe1136714e Release `rules_java` `v8.5.0`

7170aea8bf52d4323342420b416ddbd994175822 Release `rules_java` `v8.5.0-rc1`
bc4a03fe5525123c04a9fe879dc2882d31e7d690 Add runfiles library to release archive
a156fe9afc192a9eccda07d322ad1aee7090e67f Move (and enable) remaining java rules & providers out of `@_builtins`

load("@rules_java//java:rules_java_deps.bzl", "rules_java_dependencies")

proto_bazel_features(name = "proto_bazel_features")

# register toolchains

rules_java_toolchains()
~~~

name: 8.5.0-rc1
body:
**Changes since 8.4.0**
7170aea8bf52d4323342420b416ddbd994175822 Release `rules_java` `v8.5.0-rc1`
bc4a03fe5525123c04a9fe879dc2882d31e7d690 Add runfiles library to release archive
a156fe9afc192a9eccda07d322ad1aee7090e67f Move (and enable) remaining java rules & providers out of `@_builtins`

**MODULE.bazel setup**
~~~
bazel_dep(name = "rules_java", version = "8.5.0-rc1")
~~~

**WORKSPACE setup**
~~~
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_java",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/releases/download/8.5.0-rc1/rules_java-8.5.0-rc1.tar.gz",
    ],
    sha256 = "49cda1b3870b10d558cab3b25e7cf3c4d0ee3c09270112c3c206c53f49f66b36",
)

load("@rules_java//java:rules_java_deps.bzl", "rules_java_dependencies")
rules_java_dependencies()
load("@com_google_protobuf//bazel/private:proto_bazel_features.bzl", "proto_bazel_features")  # buildifier: disable=bzl-visibility
proto_bazel_features(name = "proto_bazel_features")
load("@rules_java//java:repositories.bzl", "rules_java_toolchains")
rules_java_toolchains()
~~~

**Using the rules**
See [the source](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/tree/8.5.0-rc1).

**New Features**
 - The java runfiles library is now provided by rules_java (6bb53061432c59b6ea043cbebf9deae8c8bee4fd)

**WORKSPACE setup**

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

    name = "rules_java",

    ],
    sha256 = "aff2f902f660928ea566e3002f46fc19caa496427c8a264ce578934dd10ef103",
)
load("@rules_java//java:repositories.bzl", "rules_java_dependencies", "rules_java_toolchains")
rules_java_dependencies()
rules_java_toolchains()

```

**Using the rules**

See [the source](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/tree/8.4.0).
